Title: Azure AI Adoption Framework A Strategic Guide for Organizations
EnhancedContent:
As organizations accelerate their digital transformation, **Azure AI** offers powerful capabilities for automation, decision-making, and business intelligence. However, successful AI adoption requires a structured approach that balances **strategy, governance, security, and operational excellence**.

The **Azure AI Adoption Framework** provides a **comprehensive roadmap** to help businesses integrate AI effectively while ensuring scalability, security, and responsible AI practices.
